mapper.select: select LIMIT_ID as id, CERT_NO as certNo, ID_NO as idNo,STATUS as status, TYPE as type from t_limitation l where l.id_no=#{idno} and l.cert_no = #{certno} and l.status = 1 and (l.due_time is null or l.due_Time > sysdate)

select ENR_HIS_ID as id, eh.CERT_NO as certNo, eh.ID_NO as idNo,eh.JUDGMINT_STATUS as judgmentStatus, eh.ENROLL_TIME as enrollTime, eh.ENROLL_NUM as enrollNum from t_enroll_history eh where id_no = #{idno} and cert_no=#{certno}

select ID_NO as idNo, ID_TYPE as idType, CERT_NO as certNo, IN_HISTORY as inHistory, ENROLL_NUM as enrollNum, PROVINCE as province, CITY_ID as city, ORG_ID as org, IN_REGISTRATION as inRegistration from t_enrollment where ID_NO = #{idno} and CERT_NO = #{certno}

select t.REG_ID as id, t.NAME as name, t.ID_NO as idNo, t.ID_TYPE as idTypeName, t.CERT_NO as certNo, Case when t.SEX =1 then '男' when t.SEX = 2 then '女' else '不知道' end as sexName, t.BIRTHDAY as birthday, d.NAME as nationName, t.NAME as certType, s.NAME as subjectName, t.ORG_NAME as orgName, DELETE_STATUS as deleteStatus from t_history_valid t ,t_dict d, T_CERT_TYPE c, T_SUBJECT s where id_no = #{idno} and CERT_NO = #{certno} and t.NATION = d.DIC_ID and c.CT_ID = t.CT_ID and t.SUBJECT = s.SUBJECT_ID

select t.REG_ID as id, t.NAME as name, t.ID_NO as idNo, t.ID_TYPE as idTypeName, t.CERT_NO as certNo, Case when t.SEX =1 then '男' when t.SEX = 2 then '女' else '未知' end as sexName, t.BIRTHDAY as birthday, d.NAME as nationName, t.NAME as certType, s.NAME as subjectName, t.ORG_NAME as orgName from t_registration t ,t_dict d, T_CERT_TYPE c, T_SUBJECT s where id_no = #{idno} and CERT_NO = #{certno} and t.NATION = d.DIC_ID and c.CT_ID = t.CT_ID and t.SUBJECT = s.SUBJECT_ID

select ob.join_in as joinIn,ob.is_open as isOpen, ob.PB_ID as provinceBatch from t_org_batch ob left join t_province_batch pb on pb.pb_id = ob.pb_id where ob.org_id = #{orgId} and ob.type = 2 and rownum <=1 order by ob.ob_id desc

select obt.OB_ID as orgBatch, obt.VALID_BEGIN_DATE as validBeginDate, obt.VALID_END_DATE as validEndDate from t_org_batch_time obt left join t_org_batch ob on ob.ob_id = obt.ob_id where ob.org_id = #{orgId} and ob.type = 2 and obt.valid_begin_date <=sysdate and obt.valid_end_date >= sysdate and rownum <=1 order by obt.obt_id desc
